attributes.action: Cut all taxes and make everyone have good schools, doctors and public transport.
attributes.background: It costs us hard working citizens so much money to pay taxes, if we cut those it would save us all money. We also need better hospitals because the NHS is in crisis at the moment. Also lots of school are struggling so you need to focus on the children.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
